name: Unpreventable Eruption
description:
An unpreventable volcanic eruption is starting near a town. Your job is to protect the town from lava for as long as possible by buying and placing buildings to slow the lava down.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 50 Compo in 48 hours, the theme was "Delay the inevitable".

Controls

WASD - Move view

Left Click - Select a building from the panel at the bottom; click again to build the selected building

Mouse - Move selected building

Mouse Wheel - Rotate selected building around

Escape / Tab - Deselect and not build the selected building
